en: Map Grid of Australia zone 48: Transverse Mercator (Map_Grid_of_Australia_zone_48)

Grid convergence uses opposite sign convention to UTM. Note: From 2012-01 to 2014-02 (v7.9.4 to v8.3.3) this record status = deprecated as area falls outside EEZ. Reinstated as valid on ratification of limit of Australian continental shelf beyond EEZ.
